categories: Category:Star Wars Adventures: Return to Vader's Castle

nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures: Return to Vader's Castle (TPB)

Star Wars Adventures: Return to Vader's Castle is a canon trade paperback that collects the five-part comic-book series Star Wars Adventures: Return to Vader's Castle. It was released on March 23, 2020 by IDW Publishing.
Return to Vader's Castle for a spooky spin on your favorite villains from a galaxy far, far away…

This exciting graphic novel explores the hidden corners of the Star Wars universe and features a wretched hive of scum and villainy including Darth Maul, Jabba the Hutt, Grand Moff Tarkin, Asajj Ventress--all under the shadow of Darth Vader!

Fans will be excited to discover these creepy stories by fan-favorite writer Cavan Scott, with art by the greatest talent from across the galaxy, including Nicoletta Baldari, Nick Brokenshire, Francesco Francavilla, Kelley Jones, Megan Levens, and Charles Paul Wilson III!
